name: Dungeon Dance Dance
description:
Dungeon Dance Dance Made for the Miz Jam #1

You are a mage, a mage who has the ability to cast fireballs, but is also quite a good dancer, but after a long night of sleep, you wake up inside of a dungeon, with a voice coming from the walls, telling you in a robotic voice that they'll test you, not only in your abilities to defend yourself, but also, if you are good on your feet while doing it.

Controls:
  • Left mouse to cast magic fireballs
  • Right  mouse to walk
  • W, A, S, D or arrow keys to hit the notes

Follow us on twitter: Shiryel and Roxo Credits:
  • Coding, design and play-testing: Shiryel and Roxo
  • Graphics: Kenney
  • Musics:

  • - Another Mistake Jonkagor
  • - The Hollow Spectacle / M Lorkiro and MEI
  • Engine: Godot Engine v3.2.2 Stable
Feedback is welcome!  Thanks for playing!
